desc.zh_cn: {cf亚都梨}大小事都爱说明，这让{sn千年}学生听得很痛苦。因此{cf亚都梨}担心自己是不是话太多，于是老师便称赞{cf亚都梨}说她就是那一点可爱。然而一旦{cf亚都梨}打开话匣子，老师却和{sn其他}学生一样逃之夭夭。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Early one morning, Toki arrives at Schale. Due to a complicated series of events, Toki has a free day and has decided to spend it with Sensei. After a chaotic day following Toki's requests, Sensei feels a growing concern for their future, now that Toki is firmly a part of it.
desc.jp: Early one morning, Toki arrives at Schale. Due to a complicated series of events, Toki has a free day and has decided to spend it with Sensei. After a chaotic day following Toki's requests, Sensei feels a growing concern for their future, now that Toki is firmly a part of it.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}一早就来到了{et夏莱}。{cf季}因为一连串的事件而失去了工作，后来得到的结论是和老师一起共事。在{cf季}的辅佐下，老师开始了不平静的一天。老师不禁担心接下来要和{cf季}一起共事的日子。

desc.en: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.

desc.zh_cn: 在{cf爱丽丝}和{cn贝里塔斯}成员进行佯攻作战的时候，{cf绿}、{cf桃井}和老师一起尝试正面突破{cn研讨会}。

desc.en: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.jp: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.zh_cn: 由于{cn贝里塔斯}暗中进行骇入行动，{cf朱音}被困在密室里。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。{cf朱音}表示了对{cf爱丽丝}的喜欢。{cf优香}突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由{cn工程师部}研发的。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.zh_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，{cf晴}提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，{cf响}提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时{cn贝里塔斯}即可开始骇入。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn: 战斗后，{cf朱音}对任务失败一事向{cf宁瑠}道歉，但{cf宁瑠}却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的{cf爱丽丝}感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的{cn游戏开发部}一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cf朱音}为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，{cf宁瑠}则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。{cf宁瑠}对{cf爱丽丝}特别感兴趣，让{cf明日奈}等人去查清{cn游戏开发部}全员的资料。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和{sn千年}的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和{cn工程师部}见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来{cf爱丽丝}遇见{cf宁瑠}，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在{cf爱丽丝}也能笑着说{cf宁瑠}是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在{sn千年}广场遇到了{sn其他}{sn千年}的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途{cf爱丽丝}还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}叫{cf宁瑠}“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和{cf爱丽丝}到了游戏厅。不出所料，{cf宁瑠}不断输给了{cf爱丽丝}，尽管{cf爱丽丝}已经教了她相当一段时间。{cf宁瑠}虽然非常恼火{cf爱丽丝}评价她的水平不好，但还是请教{cf爱丽丝}连招的操作。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf爱丽丝}居然不害怕{cf宁瑠}感到惊讶，而{cf爱丽丝}则表示是因为{cf宁瑠}现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解{cf爱丽丝}的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成{cf柚子}布置的任务，但{cf爱丽丝}还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.jp: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 送走{cf爱丽丝}后，{sn千年}的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的{cf桃井}突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救{cf爱丽丝}。

desc.en: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.jp: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.zh_cn: 老师与{cn游戏开发部}、{cn工程师部}与{cnC&C}分析当前形势。众人一致同意{cf爱丽丝}被带走属于紧急事件，而{cf宁瑠}则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.jp: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}向{cf爱丽丝}阐述{cf爱丽丝}实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。{cf柚子}和{cf绿}坚信{cf爱丽丝}决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时{cf桃井}出现。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.jp: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}突然出现，{cf绿}立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。{cf桃井}在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将{cf爱丽丝}救回来。大家都表示了赞同，{cf宁瑠}甚至还表扬了{cf桃井}大胆敢说的性格。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}正在寻找{cf爱丽丝}的行踪。借由{cf乃爱}和{cf优香}的协助后，调查出{cf爱丽丝}已经前往{cf莉音}创造的要塞都市「{et埃里都}」了。在潜入{et埃里都}之前，{cf宁瑠}提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 众人联系了{cf优香}等人，{cf优香}听闻{cf爱丽丝}被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向{cn研讨会}请求帮助，希望能确认{cf爱丽丝}的具体所在地。

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.zh_cn: 不出老师所料，{cf优香}和{cf乃爱}找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连{cf优香}都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，{cf优香}找到了一个叫做“{et埃里都}”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。{cf优香}将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_cn: {cn工程师部}认为都市的建造原料应该是从{sn千年}本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇{cn工程师部}为何会愿意参与此事，{cf咏叶}则表示会长带走{cf爱丽丝}的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对{cn工程师部}宣战。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.zh_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。{cf绿}和{cf柚子}简单讲述了{cf季}当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。{cf宁瑠}罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将{cf爱丽丝}救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，{cn游戏开发部}和{cn工程师部}趁机救出即可。{cn贝里塔斯}则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.

desc.en: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.jp: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.zh_cn: 从睡梦中惊醒的{cf优香}慌忙赶到现场，这才发现其他{sn千年}学园的学生在自己熟睡的时候，帮忙准备大运动会。{cf优香}向帮助自己的{cf乃爱}和老师道谢……「晄轮大祭」顺利开幕。

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
